description:
An attractive female friend of mine was away on vacation when she saw Drew jogging along the shoreline. Her eyes were instantly glued to his lean, cut body.

She tossed her sandals aside and ran after him, calling out for him to stop. But Drew’s headphones were on, so she actually had to sprint a distance down the beach to catch up with him. When she finally did, she snapped a quick picture and got his name and phone number.

When she got back home, she was very excited to show me his photo. I was really impressed... in the picture he was all sweaty and the shadows from the waning sun really made his muscles stand out. Drew, needing to pay his tuition, agreed to rub one off for us. You've got to love chiseled college men!
title: Drew
